roles.name: Mafia
roles.description: You are a member of the Mafia. Your goal is to eliminate all townspeople while avoiding detection.

abilities.name: Night Kill
abilities.description: Work with other Mafia members to choose one player to eliminate each night.

knowledge.description: You know the identities of all other Mafia members.

win_condition.description: Mafia wins when they equal or outnumber the remaining townspeople.

card_instructions: You are Mafia. Keep this secret!
At night, work with other Mafia to choose a target.
During the day, blend in and avoid suspicion.
Win by equaling or outnumbering the town.

roles.name: Detective
roles.description: You are the Detective. Each night, you can investigate one player to learn their alignment.

abilities.name: Investigate
abilities.description: Point to one player. The moderator will reveal if they are Mafia or Town.

win_condition.description: Town wins when all Mafia members are eliminated.

card_instructions: You are the Detective. Keep this secret!
Each night, investigate one player's alignment.
Use your information wisely without revealing yourself.
Win by eliminating all Mafia members.

roles.name: Doctor
roles.description: You are the Doctor. Each night, you can protect one player from elimination.

abilities.name: Protect
abilities.description: Choose one player to protect from Mafia attacks. You can protect yourself.
restrictions: Cannot protect the same player two nights in a row

win_condition.description: Town wins when all Mafia members are eliminated.

card_instructions: You are the Doctor. Keep this secret!
Each night, protect one player from elimination.
You cannot protect the same player twice in a row.
Win by eliminating all Mafia members.

roles.name: Vigilante
roles.description: You are the Vigilante. You have the power to eliminate players at night, but use it wisely.

abilities.name: Vigilante Kill
abilities.description: Choose one player to eliminate during the night. Be careful not to hit townspeople!

win_condition.description: Town wins when all Mafia members are eliminated.

card_instructions: You are the Vigilante. Keep this secret!
You can kill up to 2 players during night phases.
Be careful not to eliminate innocent townspeople!
Win by eliminating all Mafia members.

roles.name: Townsperson
roles.description: You are a regular Townsperson. You have no special abilities, but your vote and voice matter.

win_condition.description: Town wins when all Mafia members are eliminated.

card_instructions: You are a Townsperson.
You have no special abilities.
Use logic and discussion to find the Mafia.
Win by eliminating all Mafia members.

roles.name: Godfather
roles.description: You are the Godfather, leader of the Mafia. You appear innocent to Detective investigations.

abilities.name: Night Kill
abilities.description: Work with other Mafia members to choose one player to eliminate each night.

abilities.name: Investigation Immunity
abilities.description: You appear as Town to Detective investigations.

knowledge.description: You know the identities of all other Mafia members.

win_condition.description: Mafia wins when they equal or outnumber the remaining townspeople.

card_instructions: You are the Godfather. Keep this secret!
You appear innocent to Detective investigations.
Work with other Mafia to eliminate townspeople.
Win by equaling or outnumbering the town.

roles.name: Jester
roles.description: You are the Jester. Your goal is to get yourself eliminated during the day phase.

win_condition.description: Jester wins if they are eliminated during a day vote. If the Jester wins, the game ends immediately.

card_instructions: You are the Jester.
Your goal is to get voted out during the day!
Act suspicious but not too suspicious.
You win alone if eliminated by vote.
